data.message:
Hello sir, mam 

Few weeks ago there are several facebook hackers that terrorized many accounts, cause even my cousin is a victim and me. Please  make sure facebook is secured and fluently free from cyber bullying and illegal hacking. T.y for the response

replies.message: Thanks for letting us know, Mark. Please feel free to review and share these tips for keeping your Facebook account secure: http://on.fb.me/1ldWJv1. We appreciate you helping us keep Facebook a safe place! -Rose
